fullText:

 Watch Jessica Vosk and Kelli Barrett Sing a Song From the Upcoming Broadway Musical Beaches 
 
 
 Broadway performances start on March 27 at the Majestic Theatre.
dtliExcerpt: Jim Parsons brings his own brand of nervous energy to Elwood P. Dowd, the gentle soul who sees a six-and-a-half-foot-tall rabbit named Harvey.
showScoreExcerpt: Jim Parsons brings his own brand of nervous energy to Elwood P. Dowd, the gentle soul who sees a six-and-a-half-foot-tall rabbit named Harvey.
rejectionReasoning: claude: This appears to be a brief plot summary or cast description rather than an evaluative review with critical assessment; openai: This text is a brief description of Jim Parsons' role in the show, not an evaluative review of the production.; gemini: This is a single sentence with no evaluative content. It's a plot summary or cast announcement, not a review.; kimi: This 29-word excerpt provides only descriptive casting information and character context without any evaluative verdict, recommendation, or critical assessment of the production's quality. It appears to be a truncated opening sentence or cast listing rather than a review with a scorable opinion.
textIssues: Show title not found in text
